table.searchString: tag=pas tag=change tag=audit | bucket _time span=1d | stats count as ops by _time user | where ops!=0 | stats stdev(ops) as SD, avg(ops) as MEAN, sparkline, latest(ops) as LAST_OPS by user | eval sig_mult=SD*1.2 | eval threshold = sig_mult+MEAN | table user MEAN SD threshold LAST_OPS sparkline | eval DELTA=LAST_OPS-threshold | eval TIMES_OVER_NORM = round(DELTA/MEAN,0) | eval ANOMALY= if(LAST_OPS>threshold,"true","false") | sort -ANOMALY
